situations.title: Yet another day in life...
situations.description:
Wife again insulted for being away most of the time. Which seemed like a staged play. Children barely come close.
 No Surprise. Of course your wife has misguided them to be away.
Thinking about where you made a mistake you didn't sleep.
 As expected you went to office late. Boss called you at once

situations.title: In lunch break...
situations.description:
On the way to your favourite restaurant, You receive a message from your Boss.
> Mr. Chatur, We have a client near eastern city. It's another one week tour for you..
> Best of luck.
> I'll send the details soon..
 What? Another in this month? This isn't even your job.

situations.title: In The chember
situations.description:
```
Boss: So Mr. Chatur, I am quite upset on your performance..

situations.title: Suddenly...
situations.description:
While thinking about this..
you walk into one of your colleague `Rancho` Who is also one of your best friends... 
```
Rancho: Hey, Chatur! How's it going?
You: Nothing man! Another tour in this month.
Rancho: Right when your boss and your wife was angry right?
You: What are you trying to say?
Rancho: Did some detective work when you were away last time. Here, Photos of your boss's car right outside of your house.
```
He shows you some photos of your house and the Car.
I have seen enough of you. If you continue like this you will have to **Leave**

```
Boss:I am not hearing anything more of your shittalk.
This one week tour is your last chance to prove. Pack your things up after lunch and report to me before leaving
You:But sir....
Boss:If you have problems then you are free to go for a picnic
You:[Angrily] It's all right sir
Boss:[With a smile] Thought so
```
